entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
